long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MinimalTube - Productive Minimal YouTube

Take control of your YouTube experience with MinimalTube. This Chrome extension offers a distraction-free, minimalistic YouTube interface that helps you stay focused while watching videos. Say goodbye to clutter, unnecessary recommendations, and even video thumbnails, and enjoy a clean, streamlined platform designed to enhance productivity. Whether you're learning, working, or just watching content, MinimalTube ensures a calm and efficient viewing experience.

Key Features:

Simple, distraction-free YouTube interface
Removes recommended videos and clutter
Option to hide video thumbnails for better focus
Focus on productivity and content consumption
Easy to use with one-click activation
Boost your focus and productivity with MinimalTube!
